heading: Advanced AI features for smarter automation

items.label: AI-Powered Insights
items.title: Instant summaries your team can trust
items.body: Rynith condenses long email and chat threads into crisp, actionable notes—tone, intent, blockers, and next steps—so agents jump in with context.

items.label: Real-time Sentiment Analysis
items.title: Understand urgency and mood in real time
items.body: Detect positive, neutral, and negative sentiment alongside intent and product cues. Auto-prioritize hot tickets and escalate at the right moment.

items.label: Automated Routing
items.title: Route to the best team and trigger the right actions
items.body: Classify by product, topic, and customer tier. Fire the correct macro, attach knowledge links, and hand off to the right queue automatically.

items.label: Customer 360 Insights
items.title: Turn conversations into product & CX insights
items.body: Roll up themes, top issues, and feature requests across channels. Share dashboards that help product and ops teams prioritize the right fixes.
